Edges-Power -- Male Avion Legendary Adventurer
Attributes (6 Points):
Agility: d6-1 Smarts: d8 Spirit: d8 Strength: d6 Vigor: d4
Attribute Notes: Armor Agility Penalty: -1 Agility (d8 required)
Skills (27 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d10-1 Focus: (spi) d6 Spellcasting: (sma) d6
Battle: (sma) d4 Intimidation: (spi) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4-1
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d6 Weird Science: (sma) d6
Faith: (spi) d10 Persuasion: (spi) d4-3
Fighting: (agi) d10-1 Psionics: (sma) d6
Skill Notes:
Armor Agility Penalty: -1 Agility-linked skills (d8 required)
Keen Senses: +1 Notice step
Mean: -1 Persuasion
Ugly+: -2 Persuasion
Can't Swim: -2 Athletics (swimming)
Flight: Uses Athletics for flight maneuvers
Mentalist: +2 opposed Psionics
Size: 0
Advances: 16 Improvement Points: 36 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 3; Edge: 18; Skill: 15
Features
Edges (9 points): Arcane Background (Gifted); Arcane Background (Magic); Arcane Background (Miracles); Arcane Background (Psionics); Arcane Background (Weird Science); Artificer; Channeling; Concentration; Extra Effort; Gadgeteer; Holy/Unholy Warrior; Improved Rapid Recharge; Mentalist; New Powers; Power Points; Power Surge; Rapid Recharge; Soul Drain; Wizard Hindrances: Cautious; Mean; Ugly+ Avion Features: Can't Swim; Flight; Frail; Keen Senses; Reduced Pace
Feature Notes:
Cautious: Requires detailed plan before acting
Mean: Ill-tempered and disagreeable
Combat
Parry: 9 (3) Cover: 4 Toughness: 6 (3) Pace/Run: 4/+d4
Armor: Bronze Corselet Shield: Ballistic Shield Weapons: Dagger (d6+d4 R3"); Gatling (2d8 R24" AP 2); Long Bow (-1 2d6 R15" AP 1); Unarmed (d6+d0)
Combat Notes:
Armor Pace Penalty: -1 Pace (d8 minimum required)
Fighting Parry Modifier: +4 Parry
Frail: -1 Toughness
Long Bow Strength Penalty: -1 attack
Reduced Pace: -1 Pace/-1 Run step
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +2
Can't Swim: Moves 1/3 Pace through water
Flight: Fly Pace 12
Arcana
Power Count: 14 Power Points: 65
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Gifted): 1 Powers/15 Power Points
Arcane Background (Magic): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
Arcane Background (Miracles): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
Arcane Background (Psionics): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
Arcane Background (Weird Science): 2 Powers/15 Power Points
Improved Rapid Recharge: Increased Rapid Recharge effects
New Powers: +2 Power Count
Power Points: +5 Power Points
Artificer: May give items arcane powers
Channeling: Raise on arcane skill roll reduces Power Point cost by 1
Concentration: Power duration doubled
Extra Effort: May spend 1 or 3 Power Points to gain +1 or +2 Focus
Gadgeteer: May jury rig arcane device from available parts
Holy/Unholy Warrior: May spend 1-4 Power Points to add equal amount to Soak roll
Power Surge: Joker Action Card restores 10 Power Points
Rapid Recharge: Recovers 20 Power Points/hr
Soul Drain: May suffer fatigue to recover 5 Power Points
Wizard: May spend 1 Power Point to change Power trapping
Notes
Validation Errors: Edge Allocation: 9 available vs. 19 allocated
